title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Nominate and Appoint Individuals to Key Administration Posts â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
February 4, 2020
Lorenzo Candelaria of New York, to be a Member of the National Council on the Humanities.Tony Hammond of Missouri, to be a Member of the Board of Trustees of the Harry S. Truman Scholarship Foundation.Isaac Applbaum of California, to be a Member of the Commission on Presidential Scholars.Constantine M. Saab of Virginia, to be a Member of the Commission on Presidential Scholars.William Henry Kirkland III of Georgia, to be a Member of the Commission on Presidential Scholars.Bradley P. Johnson of Virginia, to be a Member of the Commission on Presidential Scholars.Jonathan D. Hiler of Virginia, to be a Member of the Board of Visitors to the United States Naval Academy.
